Text.Text: A central factory gate for employees and logistic transports to increase security and safety. Drunk workers? Already sent home at the gate. Industrial espionage? Pointless!
Light flooded offices for all the administrative tasks a huge factory requires. Don't forget to greet the director when you cross his path.
Lighter, stronger, cheaper - your engineers are constantly researching and testing to improve the materials used.
Quickly loads and unloads bulk goods. The investment was pushed through by the works council to improve the working conditions.
Where manufactured goods are automatically transported from workplace to workplace.
Additional space for logistics, maintenance activities and ancillary processes of all kinds.
Additional space for logistics, maintenance activities and ancillary processes of all kinds.
Modern cold forming processes guarantee high dimensional accuracy and are therefore ideal for the visible outer skin of your trains.
This chimney hurls soot particles into the air far above the rooftops of your city. Nevertheless, it is not a pretty sight for your inhabitants.
Where the subways are carried from workspace to workspace automatically.
Additional space for logistics, maintenance activities and ancillary processes of all kinds.
Goods can be transported quickly and easily between buildings and emissions of all kinds are shielded from the outside.
Goods can be transported quickly and easily between buildings and emissions of all kinds are shielded from the outside.

Produces Goods and Buffs the <font overrideTextColor="true" color='#41dcd7'>Subway Factory</font>

[AssetData(2100115684) Text][AssetData(2100115698) Text][AssetData(2100115699) Text][AssetData(2100115800) Text]
Single tickets, family tickets, monthly tickets, annual tickets, student and pensioner tickets... The ticket factory prints them all.
An abstract representation of a park... at least that's what the architect would say...
A glamorous station for the financial center of your metropolis
Monumental columns and graceful round arches characterize this station, a homage to ancient architecture
They just didn't know how else to design the station...
This is where the architects apparently incorporated their impressions of excessive study trips
This is where the architects apparently incorporated their impressions of excessive study trips
Entrance Building with a green roof
Entrance Building with a red roof
Entrance Building with a blue roof
A fancy glass roof: Beneficial in bad weather, a greenhouse on hot summer days
Affects All Public Services, All Engineer and All Investor Residences in street range of a Subway Station.
Remarkable Subway Network: Public Service Buff
Affects All Public Services, All Engineer and All Investor Residences in street range of a Subway Station.
Superior Subway Network: Public Service Buff
Just a few stations, barely covering the main spots of your city.
The subway network is growing more and more into a powerful means of transport.
This subway network now covers almost every place in your city from the suburbs to the center.
These tunnels are widely know as the catacombs of modern times. Only a handful of metropolises can claim to have such a powerful subway network.
Blends in with the imposing high-rise districts
These special trained employees know which part you are looking for, before you even know it. Buffs the <font overrideTextColor="true" color='#41dcd7'>Subway Factory</font>

Produces Goods and Buffs the <font overrideTextColor="true" color='#41dcd7'>Subway Factory</font>
[AssetData(2100115684) Text][AssetData(2100115693) Text][AssetData(2100115694) Text][AssetData(2100115685) Text][AssetData(2100115691) Text]
The fastest way to travel in your metropolis

"Heavy equipment like recently invented cylindrical shields slowly dig their way through the solid stratums under your city. Cast iron linings or concrete tubbings are installed directly afterwards so all pressures from the soil and the shield can be resisted" - Bruno Ironbright, Notes on a Lecture
Workers lay the tracks, pull power lines, equip the tunnels with lamps, install elevators and design the stations according to the architects' ideas
Subway Car 01 Factory Module Bridge Vehicle

Office supplies such as typewriters, drawing paper or rulers are the property of the Metropolitan Transport Department and may not be stolen for domestic use! Violation will be punished with immediate termination - Sincerely, the Management.

Announcement of the winners of the annual paper airplane competition: 1. Tunnel Construction Department: 520 points; 2. Accounting: 473 points; 3. Station Management: 399 points; 4. Human Resources: 238 points.

Due to a technical defect in the machine room, elevators eight and nine are out of service until further notice. Please use the stairwells to reach floors 49 to 59. - Kind Regards, the property manager.

Produces Goods and Buffs the <font overrideTextColor="true" color='#41dcd7'>Subway Factory</font>
[AssetData(2100115684) Text][AssetData(2100115804) Text][AssetData(2100115695) Text][AssetData(2100115685) Text][AssetData(2100115696) Text]
... Construction plans for the double-walled ground anchors can be found in aisle 32, shelf 12, compartment 9. A copy will be made within 2 working days after submission of form 72b.
A giant central department for thousands of employees working on the continuous subway network expansion and maintenance.
Affects All Public Services, All Engineer and All Investor Residences in street range of a Subway Station.
Modest Subway Network: Public Service Buff
Affects All Public Services, All Engineer and All Investor Residences in street range of a Subway Station.
Ordinary Subway Network: Public Service Buff
The City Sinks into Traffic Chaos!

A 50-strong panel of experts, made up of the Empire's finest engineers and scholars, is currently discussing innovative modes of transportation that can keep the great metropolises functioning efficiently.
City Council Finally Decides on Subway Construction!

After the expert commission were in favor of the introduction of a subway a few months ago, a scarce 2/3 majority of the city council pushed through the construction of a first line. Politicians confirm, a new central transport department must now be created, which, once finished, will be entrusted with the implemention of today's council decision.

After a lenghty construction period and exploded costs, the first subway station was officially opened in the presence of representatives from politics, science and the royal court. Critics, however, still doubt their usefulness and call for an investigative committee against the city council.
This recipe is unlocked at 2.700 Artistas and after you built at least 15 Level 3 Investor Skyscrapers
This recipe is unlocked at 1 Elder and after you built at least 15 Level 3 Investor Skyscrapers

In this imaginary process, crushed coal and soot particles are used as coloring agent. The particles are mixed with caoutchouc under great heat and then applied to the paper under pressure. Inefficient in production and of poor quality once finished. Tickets are barely legible even before they are sold.
The Metropolitan Transport Department is ready for an Upgrade!
The Metropolitan Transport Department has reached its final stage!
A subway is passing every 30 seconds
A subway spawns 12 tiles behind and then goes 24 tiles forward. Combine it with the 3rd Skin!
Subways passing by from time to time...
Eyewitnesses report that monstrous creatures are up to mischief in the subway tunnels and devour everyone who enters them - interview with famous hunter Steen on page 3!

In this process, the mostly anorganic pigments from various minerals are used as the coloring agent. These are extremely resistant to aging and retain their color almost indefinitely. Your tickets will definitely still be readable in a few years!

In this process, the organic pigment Indigo is used as the coloring agent. It has been one of the most commonly used colorants for thousands of years and can be obtained from various indigo-bearing plants through a series of chemical processes. Since the late 19th century it can be produced synthetically as well.
Yellow walls and a blue roof
Red walls and a blue roof
Unlock Newspaper Crocodiles in the Tunnels Trigger
A new press is delivered by heavy haulage
Building does not adapt to terrain height
To build walkway module after walkway module
To clip the walkway module into buildings

Provides a public service for your residents when finished
Ironbright elected the new Subway Factory Inspector by the Board!

Insiders report that this is the consequence of an increasing number of incidents and production errors. Accordingly, the previous management is suspected to be overwhelmed by the rapidly growing capitalist machinery.
White walls with a red roof
